name: Short Cuts Lawn Mowing Academy
description:
Short Cuts Lawn Mowing Academy

welcome to the Short Cuts Lawn Mowing Academy, your first step on the road to a garden-scaping dream career. We'll teach you everything you need to know to become a professional lawn alteration specialist. (Devlog out soon)

Made for the What-a-jam game jam, hosted by Whateep, May 2021. Check out Whateeps awesome YouTube channel. 

All the music in the game is available to buy on my itch.io page. If you use construct 3, you can also buy the source code and recreate the game yourself. https://xanderwood.itch.io/

Get all my music, source files and game assets for free by becoming a patreon. https://www.patreon.com/xanderwood
